content.title: Make a Difference
content.description: We want to use our money, time, and resources to love and serve people on the margins. Are you looking to get involved?

image1.alt: Volunteer with hat smiling at camera.

content.text1: We want to use our time, money, and resources to love and serve people on the margins. Are you looking to get involved?

list.title: Volunteering
list.text: Volunteering is one way we get to grow as disciples of Jesus. Have a gift or passion you want to share with others? We would love to help you find a place where you can serve your community and meet the needs of those around you.
list.imageAlt: A volunteer mixing the video for Sunday

list.title: Compassion
list.text: All people are created in the image of God and have infinite worth. Therefore we love, serve, and partner with vulnerable people as we journey toward relationship, justice, and peace.
